1. Endless grind for blood points to use (10) good perk over 70 or so, maybe even more.
2. Garbage settings. (low) (medium) (high) (ultra) ???. Gotta go into .ini to unlock 120fps else it's locked to 60.
3. swf being able to queue MM(4)/(3), makes the game a fun bully fest for survivors against the killers.

Game is really fun in short burst. 

Good game when you are intoxicated.

I would recomand it but if u have a weak device, your device will overheat and then close or it will crash. The game is a bit badly optimized. But overall i would recomand it because it is a good game.

you can play with friends and make up strategies to win games.

A little pay to win, not mutch but a little. You can buy op killers but with a good team you win anyway so who cares.

Macht immer wieder Spaß zu spielen ^^

This game used to be really decent but the developers no longer care.  Every update is 1/2 step forward and 4 back.  It's permanently glitchy and full of bugs, yet they focus their attention on irrelevant updates.   The current Chapter was launched a week ago and the new map has been out of action for nearly a week.  They do not care about the community that has stuck with them and devoted a lot of time and money to this game.  Avoid DBD  and do not give BHVR any more money.

Good game, anyone can play, i like the fact that with practise anyone rlly can get good at the game. Theres lots of content and so u never rlly get bored, new updates are cool, although some time the game can be a little unfair but all in all good.
Mostly trying to mind game your opponent, so if you enjoy that and have friends willing to try the game, it's very fun.
This game is epic, like thats not a joke

Коммьюнити в дбд это когда:
Ман кемпит/туннелит - слабый, никчёмный игрок, не способный побеждать честно, зачем вообще этот слабак играет в игру, если он ни на что не способен, -реп!
Сурв абузит всё что только можно: абузный мейн, абузные конструкции, абузные участки карты, или даже целую карту на букву х(еддонфилд) - красава, крутой мансер, классно играет, +реп!
Ман берёт какую нибудь Рин Ямаоку - отвратительный игрок, не способный играть на нормальных убийцах, у него нет вообще никакого скилла, -реп!
Сурвы собираются пачкой из 4 человек, у которых суммарно 5 и более тысяч часов - классные ребята, играют вместе, так и надо, все молодцы всем +реп!
Ман берёт какой нибудь топовый аддон - слабак, не умеет играть на нормальных аддонах, если бы не это, он бы даже -1 не сделал, -реп!
Сурв берёт аптеку на 4 прохила, жирный туллбокс, фонарик с двумя батарейками, или вообще ключ с подношением на люк - прикольно, весело и классно, полезные девайсы для победы, +реп!
Ман берёт удобную для себя карту - никчёмный нуб, не умеет играть на нормальных картах, -реп!
Сурв берёт удобную карту на букву х(еддонфилд), или любую другую карту - не хочет играть на убогих картах, что бы не портить себе игру, молодец, так и надо, +реп!

10 двойных стандартов из 10.
худешее комьюнити, кучи багов, сломаный хит бокс, лютый диз баланс с тимами в дискорде, которые в 90% случаях дают сделать лишь по килу, разработчики болванчики

Its a cool little game to grind out and unlock all the perks, other than that its the same game over and over except its against a different killer who wants to exterminate you for fun, cool stuff. 10/10
Great game for yourself or for fun with friends. Runs easy on most devices and is easy to stream on many platforms for content creation.
Majority of the game are toxic players buts whats a game without a little toxicity

1000h huh? Seria muita hipocrisia eu deixar uma análise negativa com essa quantidade absurda de horas, então bora falar sobre o próximo update do jogo que deve chegar daqui a duas semanas.
O grind do jogo foi reduzido? Sim, o novo sistema de prestigio junto com os incentivos de matchmaking devem alivar o grind mas temo que não sera suficiente para os novos jogadores, no geral a mudança foi positiva e espero que eles melhorem o grind ainda em 2022.
E o meta do jogo? Foi resolvido, tem perks que precisam de mais ajustes (to olhando pra vocês, NOED e Off the record) mas finalmente as pessoas vão sair de suas zonas de conforto.
E a gameplay geral do jogo? Para os assassinos foi reduzido em 10% a velocidade para executar varias ações como quebrar uma pallet, chutar um gerador e limpar a arma, aumentaram o tempo pra fazer geradores de 80 para 90 segundos e outras coisas menores.
Para os sobreviventes uma versão modificada do borrowed time foi adicionada como uma habilidade de todos os sobreviventes, isso não ajuda em nada contra um letherface mas deve funcionar contra outros assassinos. no geral, essas mudanças são boas.
E a performance do jogo? Continua ruim, Dead by Daylight foi lançado em 2016 e provavelmente é um inferno de lidar com o código jogo então eu deixo essa passar por enquanto.
No fim das contas dbd é um jogo muito bom, dito isso
Vejo vocês em setembro quando o Wesker lançar
es un juego muy bueno hay bastante variedad de personajes y la colaboracion  con resin evil esta muy buena 100% RECOMENDADO
I highly enjoy this game. I have many more hours to put into it for sure.
The game is cool. no not really. some killers are really pain in the ass. but good

absolute cancer. gets boring and repetitive after 2 or 3 days of play. overglorified hide and seek. 
if you're a killer, expect to get trash talked a lot in the end game chat whenever you do well and manage to kill teabagging, toxic survivors. this game houses some of the most entitled pieces of shit imaginable.

Absolutely horendous nothing about this game is any good from the gameplay to the community it is all just absoluetly awful. I can't get in one game without having to go against the highest ranked killers as a low rank survivor and it makes the game no fun and unfair to me who has little experience. Plus don't get me started on the awful servers ping difference. The killer gets 200 ping and now he has the ability to hit you from across the map or through any pallet or window after vaulting it 15 seconds ago. This game overall is just not a well made game and I would never reccomend buying it or spending on money on it if you already made the terrible mistake of deciding to purchase it.
